mapper.select: SELECT * FROM project_info
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM project_info
SELECT * FROM alarm_history limit #{page},10
SELECT * FROM alarm_history WHERE alarm_type = #{alarmType} limit #{page},10
SELECT * FROM alarm_history WHERE alarm_type = #{alarmType} limit #{page},10
SELECT * FROM alarm_history WHERE device_id = #{deviceId} limit #{page},10
SELECT * FROM alarm_history WHERE project_id = #{projectId} limit #{page},10
SELECT * FROM project_device WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND building_id = #{buildingNum} AND flag = 1
SELECT project_id FROM project_info WHERE admin_rent_id = #{adminRentId} AND project_state != 4
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO install_info(user_id, project_id, device_id) VALUES(#{userId}, #{projectId}, #{deviceId})
INSERT INTO electricbox_stop_info(project_id, manager_id, number) VALUES(#{projectId}, #{managerId}, #{number})
mapper.select: INSERT INTO company_info(company_name,project_id) VALUES (#{companyName},#{projectId}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE company_name=VALUES(company_name),project_id=VALUES(project_id)
INSERT INTO configuration_list(project_id,six_meters_num) VALUES (#{projectId},#{sixMetersNum}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE project_id=VALUES(project_id),six_meters_num=VALUES(six_meters_num)
SELECT project_id FROM project_info WHERE INSTR(project_name,#{subString}) > 0 OR INSTR(region,#{subString}) > 0
SELECT * FROM project_info WHERE INSTR(region,#{regionKey}) limit #{pageNum},5
SELECT * FROM project_info WHERE INSTR(region,#{regionKey})
SELECT * FROM project_info limit #{pageNum},5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_device(project_id, device_id, building_id, location_id, start_time, location) VALUES(#{projectId}, #{deviceId}, #{buildingId}, #{locationId}, current_timestamp, #{location})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM project_plane_graph WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND building_id = #{buildingId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_plane_graph(project_id, building_id, location, time) VALUES (#{projectId}, #{buildingId}, #{location}, current_timestamp)
mapper.update: INSERT INTO project_sup_info(project_id, project_name, construction_unit, supervision_unit, nacelle_inspection_unit, curtain_wall_consultant_unit, max_meters, max_layers, area, building_numbers, construction_unit_contacts, construction_unit_phone, construction_unit_address, total_package_unit, total_package_unit_contacts, total_package_unit_phone, total_package_unit_address, supervision_unit_contacts, supervision_unit_phone, supervision_unit_address,subcontractor,subcontractor_contacts,subcontractor_phone, subcontractor_address,nacelle_inspection_unit_contacts,nacelle_inspection_unit_phone,nacelle_inspection_unit_address, curtain_wall_consultant_unit_contacts,curtain_wall_consultant_unit_phone,curtain_wall_consultant_unit_address, qualification_unit,qualification_unit_contacts,qualification_unit_phone,qualification_unit_address, property_unit,property_unit_contacts,property_unit_phone,property_unit_address, quality_inspection_unit,quality_inspection_unit_contacts,quality_inspection_unit_phone,quality_inspection_unit_address, safety_supervision_unit,safety_supervision_unit_contacts,safety_supervision_unit_phone,safety_supervision_unit_address) VALUES (#{projectId}, #{projectName}, #{constructionUnit}, #{supervisionUnit}, #{nacelleInspectionUnit}, #{curtainWallConsultantUnit}, #{maxMeters}, #{maxLayers}, #{area}, #{buildingNumbers}, #{constructionUnitContacts}, #{constructionUnitPhone}, #{constructionUnitAddress}, #{totalPackageUnit}, #{totalPackageUnitContacts}, #{totalPackageUnitPhone}, #{totalPackageUnitAddress}, #{supervisionUnitContacts}, #{supervisionUnitPhone}, #{supervisionUnitAddress}, #{subcontractor},#{subcontractorContacts},#{subcontractorPhone},#{subcontractorAddress}, #{nacelleInspectionUnitContacts},#{nacelleInspectionUnitPhone},#{nacelleInspectionUnitAddress}, #{curtainWallConsultantUnitContacts},#{curtainWallConsultantUnitPhone},#{curtainWallConsultantUnitAddress}, #{qualificationUnit},#{qualificationUnitContacts},#{qualificationUnitPhone},#{qualificationUnitAddress}, #{propertyUnit},#{propertyUnitContacts},#{propertyUnitPhone},#{propertyUnitAddress}, #{qualityInspectionUnit},#{qualityInspectionUnitContacts},#{qualityInspectionUnitPhone},#{qualityInspectionUnitAddress}, #{safetySupervisionUnit},#{safetySupervisionUnitContacts},#{safetySupervisionUnitPhone},#{safetySupervisionUnitAddress}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE project_id=VALUES(project_id),project_name=VALUES(project_name), construction_unit=VALUES(construction_unit), supervision_unit=VALUES(supervision_unit), nacelle_inspection_unit=VALUES(nacelle_inspection_unit),curtain_wall_consultant_unit=VALUES(curtain_wall_consultant_unit), max_meters=VALUES(max_meters), max_layers=VALUES(max_layers), area=VALUES(area), building_numbers=VALUES(building_numbers), construction_unit_contacts=VALUES(construction_unit_contacts), construction_unit_phone=VALUES(construction_unit_phone), construction_unit_address=VALUES(construction_unit_address), total_package_unit=VALUES(total_package_unit), total_package_unit_contacts=VALUES(total_package_unit_contacts),total_package_unit_phone=VALUES(total_package_unit_phone), total_package_unit_address=VALUES(total_package_unit_address), supervision_unit_contacts=VALUES(supervision_unit_contacts),supervision_unit_phone=VALUES(supervision_unit_phone), supervision_unit_address=VALUES(supervision_unit_address), subcontractor=VALUES(subcontractor),subcontractor_contacts=VALUES(subcontractor_contacts),subcontractor_phone=VALUES(subcontractor_phone), subcontractor_address=VALUES(subcontractor_address),nacelle_inspection_unit_contacts=VALUES(nacelle_inspection_unit_contacts), nacelle_inspection_unit_phone=VALUES(nacelle_inspection_unit_phone),nacelle_inspection_unit_address=VALUES(nacelle_inspection_unit_address), curtain_wall_consultant_unit_contacts=VALUES(curtain_wall_consultant_unit_contacts),curtain_wall_consultant_unit_phone=VALUES(curtain_wall_consultant_unit_phone), curtain_wall_consultant_unit_address=VALUES(curtain_wall_consultant_unit_address), qualification_unit=VALUES(qualification_unit),qualification_unit_contacts=VALUES(qualification_unit_contacts), qualification_unit_phone=VALUES(qualification_unit_phone),qualification_unit_address=VALUES(qualification_unit_address), property_unit=VALUES(property_unit),property_unit_contacts=VALUES(property_unit_contacts),property_unit_phone=VALUES(property_unit_phone), property_unit_address=VALUES(property_unit_address), quality_inspection_unit=VALUES(quality_inspection_unit),quality_inspection_unit_contacts=VALUES(quality_inspection_unit_contacts), quality_inspection_unit_phone=VALUES(quality_inspection_unit_phone),quality_inspection_unit_address=VALUES(quality_inspection_unit_address), safety_supervision_unit=VALUES(safety_supervision_unit),safety_supervision_unit_contacts=VALUES(safety_supervision_unit_contacts), safety_supervision_unit_phone=VALUES(safety_supervision_unit_phone),safety_supervision_unit_address=VALUES(safety_supervision_unit_address)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO install_check(project_id, device_id, manager_id, dealer_id, description, record) VALUES(#{projectId}, #{deviceId}, #{managerId}, #{dealerId}, #{description}, #{record})
